<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surreptitious Spellcaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=1135) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Prerequisites**
[Spellmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1134)

</column>

---

You’ve learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed. You gain the [Conceal Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=640) wizard class feat, though it’s not a wizard feat for you. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks to Conceal a Spell and to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks to conceal verbal components.
name: Surreptitious Spellcaster
